Source.Name: libburn
Source.Summary: libburn is a library by which preformatted data get onto optical media
Source.Description: libburn is a library by which preformatted data get onto optical media: CD, DVD, BD (Blu-Ray). On Linux it uses either /dev/sgN (on kernel 2.4 with ide-scsi) or /dev/srM , /dev/hdX ( on kernel 2.6). On FreeBSD it uses /dev/cdN, eventually via atapicam. On Solaris addresses look like /dev/rdsk/cXtYd0s2.
